issue.title: [Rust] Memory is never released
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2420](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2420). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Another embarrassing bug ... the code was calling the wrong method to release memory and wasn't releasing memory.

I have added some benchmarks for testing performance of creating arrays (and dropping them) and these are working well now after fixing the memory bug.
